How GoSnel Works

Customer submits order and chooses delivery method

Customers discover your restaurant through GoSnel's AI recommendations.

You receive order via WhatsApp, pickup, or your existing apps like Talabat and Noon Food

Start preparing orders immediately and serve your customers.

Track your earnings

Monitor your restaurant's performance and growth.

Common Questions

Do I need technical experience?

No — just send your menu and we set everything up for you.

Are there setup fees?

it's completely free.

Can I pause orders if the kitchen is busy?

Yes, you can pause or resume orders anytime.

How will I receive orders?

You'll receive orders directly via WhatsApp, pickup orders through your dashboard, or through your existing apps like Talabat and Noon Food.
